de.mrapp.android.adapter

Class AdapterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.adapter.AdapterFactory

  • public final class AdapterFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    An utility class, which offers factory methods, which allow to initialize instances of the types ListAdapter, SingleChoiceListAdapter or MultipleChoiceListAdapter.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • createListAdapter

        public static <DataType> ListAdapter<DataType> createListAdapter(Context context,
                                                                 ListDecorator<DataType> decorator,
                                                                 @LayoutRes
                                                                 int viewId)
        Creates and returns an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary items.
        Type Parameters:
        DataType - The type of the adapter's underlying data
        Parameters:
        context - The context, the adapter belongs to, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        decorator - The decorator, which should be used to customize the appearance of the views, which are used to visualize the items of the adapter, as an instance of the type ListDecorator. The decorator may not be null
        viewId - The resource id of the view, which should be used to visualize the items of the adapter, as an Integer value. The id must correspond to a valid view resource
        Returns:
        The adapter, which has been created, as an instance of the type ListAdapter

      • createExpandableListAdapter

        public static <GroupType,ChildType> ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> createExpandableListAdapter(Context context,
                                                                                                           ExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType> decorator,
                                                                                                           @LayoutRes
                                                                                                           int groupViewId,
                                                                                                           @LayoutRes
                                                                                                           int childViewId)
        Creates and returns an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary group and child items.
        Type Parameters:
        GroupType - The type of the underlying data of the adapter's group items
        ChildType - The type of the underlying data of the adapter's child items
        Parameters:
        context - The context, the adapter belongs to, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        decorator - The decorator, which should be used to customize the appearance of the views, which are used to visualize the group and child items of the adapter, as an instance of the type ExpandableListDecorator. The decorator may not be null
        groupViewId - The resource id of the view, which should be used to visualize the group items of the adapter, as an Integer value. The id must correspond to a valid view resource
        childViewId - The resource id of the view, which should be used to visualize the child items of the adapter, as an Integer value. The id must correspond to a valid view resource
        Returns:
        The adapter, which has been created, as an instance of the type ExpandableListAdapter

      • createExpandableListAdapter

        public static <GroupType,ChildType> ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> createExpandableListAdapter(Context context,
                                                                                                           ExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType> decorator,
                                                                                                           View groupView,
                                                                                                           View childView)
        Creates and returns an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary group and child items.
        Type Parameters:
        GroupType - The type of the underlying data of the adapter's group items
        ChildType - The type of the underlying data of the adapter's child items
        Parameters:
        context - The context, the adapter belongs to, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        decorator - The decorator, which should be used to customize the appearance of the views, which are used to visualize the group and child items of the adapter, as an instance of the type ExpandableListDecorator. The decorator may not be null
        groupView - The view, which should be used to visualize the group items of the adapter, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        childView - The view, which should be used to visualize the child items of the adapter, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        Returns:
        The adapter, which has been created, as an instance of the type ExpandableListAdapter

      • createSingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter

        public static <GroupType,ChildType> SingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> createSingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter(Context context,
                                                                                                                                   SelectableExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType> decorator,
                                                                                                                                   @LayoutRes
                                                                                                                                   int groupViewId,
                                                                                                                                   @LayoutRes
                                                                                                                                   int childViewId,
                                                                                                                                   ChoiceMode choiceMode)
        Creates and returns an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary group and child items, of which only one can be selected at once.
        Type Parameters:
        GroupType - The type of the underlying data of the adapter's group items
        ChildType - The type of the underlying data of the adapter's child items
        Parameters:
        context - The context, the adapter belongs to, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        decorator - The The decorator, which should be used to customize the appearance of the views, which are used to visualize the group and child items of the adapter, as an instance of the type SelectableExpandableListDecorator. The decorator may not be null
        groupViewId - The resource id of the view, which should be used to visualize the group items of the adapter, as an Integer value. The id must correspond to a valid view resource
        childViewId - The resource id of the view, which should be used to visualize the child items of the adapter, as an Integer value. The id must correspond to a valid view resource
        choiceMode - The choice mode of the adapter as a value of the enum ChoiceMode. The choice mode may either be GROUPS_ONLY, CHILDREN_ONLY or GROUPS_AND_CHILDREN
        Returns:
        The adapter, which has been created, as an instance of the type SingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter

      • createSingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter

        public static <GroupType,ChildType> SingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType> createSingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter(Context context,
                                                                                                                                   SelectableExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType> decorator,
                                                                                                                                   View groupView,
                                                                                                                                   View childView,
                                                                                                                                   ChoiceMode choiceMode)
        Creates and returns an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary group and child items, of which only one can be selected at once.
        Type Parameters:
        GroupType - The type of the underlying data of the adapter's group items
        ChildType - The type of the underlying data of the adapter's child items
        Parameters:
        context - The context, the adapter belongs to, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        decorator - The The decorator, which should be used to customize the appearance of the views, which are used to visualize the group and child items of the adapter, as an instance of the type SelectableExpandableListDecorator. The decorator may not be null
        groupView - The view, which should be used to visualize the group items of the adapter, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        childView - The view, which should be used to visualize the child items of the adapter, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        choiceMode - The choice mode of the adapter as a value of the enum ChoiceMode. The choice mode may either be GROUPS_ONLY, CHILDREN_ONLY or GROUPS_AND_CHILDREN
        Returns:
        The adapter, which has been created, as an instance of the type SingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter

                                                                                                                                       ChoiceMode choiceMode)
        Creates and returns an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary group and child items, of which multiple items can be selected at once.
        Type Parameters:
        GroupType - The type of the underlying data of the adapter's group items
        ChildType - The type of the underlying data of the adapter's child items
        Parameters:
        context - The context, the adapter belongs to, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        decorator - The The decorator, which should be used to customize the appearance of the views, which are used to visualize the group and child items of the adapter, as an instance of the type SelectableExpandableListDecorator. The decorator may not be null
        groupViewId - The resource id of the view, which should be used to visualize the group items of the adapter, as an Integer value. The id must correspond to a valid view resource
        childViewId - The resource id of the view, which should be used to visualize the child items of the adapter, as an Integer value. The id must correspond to a valid view resource
        choiceMode - The choice mode of the adapter as a value of the enum ChoiceMode. The choice mode may either be GROUPS_ONLY, CHILDREN_ONLY or GROUPS_AND_CHILDREN
        Returns:
        The adapter, which has been created, as an instance of the type MultipleChoiceExpandableListAdapter

        decorator - The The decorator, which should be used to customize the appearance of the views, which are used to visualize the group and child items of the adapter, as an instance of the type SelectableExpandableListDecorator. The decorator may not be null
        groupView - The view, which should be used to visualize the group items of the adapter, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
        childView - The view, which should be used to visualize the child items of the adapter, as an instance of the class View. The view may not be null
